title: Germany votes to bring back voluntary military service
description: The shift in its approach to its military follows a push to create Europe's strongest conventional army.
content:
Germany's parliament, the Bundestag, has voted to introduce voluntary military service, in a move aimed at boosting national defences after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
